playerList.name: 레트로아크 64 - ffmpeg
playerList.description: Supported extensions: mkv, avi, f4v, f4f, 3gp, ogm, flv, mp4, mp3, flac, ogg, m4a, webm, 3g2, mov, wmv, mpg, mpeg, vob, asf, divx, m2p, m2ts, ps, ts, mxf, wma, wav.
playerList.amStartArguments:
-n com.retroarch.aarch64/com.retroarch.browser.retroactivity.RetroActivityFuture
  -e ROM {file.path}
  -e LIBRETRO /data/data/com.retroarch.aarch64/cores/ffmpeg_libretro_android.so
  -e CONFIGFILE /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.retroarch.aarch64/files/retroarch.cfg
  -e IME com.android.inputmethod.latin/.LatinIME
  -e DATADIR /data/data/com.retroarch.aarch64
  -e APK /data/app/com.retroarch.aarch64-1/base.apk
  -e SDCARD /storage/emulated/0
  -e EXTERNAL /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.retroarch.aarch64/files
  --activity-clear-task
  --activity-clear-top
